timeline.author: tterem

replies.bodyText: It can be removed, but best practice is to keep those in commented out so that messages do not get accidentally reused.
replies.author: rhusar

replies.bodyText: Even if this message has never been part of a WildFly.Final version? It's just in WF19.Beta1, right?
replies.author: maeste

replies.bodyText: That's a good point – we don't have to be overly rigid here – since it was never in any Final version and this willl be backported. Removed now.
replies.author: rhusar
